# GRAPHICS::FADE_DECALS_IN_RANGE

## Summary
Fades out all decals within the range of a position over the fade time

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** posX
* **FLOAT** posY
* **FLOAT** posZ
* **FLOAT** range
* **FLOAT** fadeTime

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Fades nearby decals within the range specified
